subtitle: A deliciously gooey starter for entertaining. Serve with redcurrant jelly.

method.text: Dry the portions of Camembert. Remove skin if desired.
Dust the cheese with the seasoned flour.
Coat the portions in the egg and breadcrumbs. Chill well.
Heat the oil to 180°C / 350F, or until a cube of day-old bread turns golden in just over 30 seconds.
Fry the cheese portions until crisp and brown. Drain on kitchen paper. Serve piping hot.

title: Fried Camembert
